General.Name: Shanghai SMI Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Chengtou Holding Co.,Ltd engages in the real estate development business in China. The company develops commercial housing, rental housing, affordable housing, and hotel projects; and undertakes technology park development, urban old district renovation, urban village renovation, and PPP projects. It also provides equity investment and private equity investment fund management services. Shanghai Chengtou Holding Co.,Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Chengtou Holding Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Shanghai City Investment (Group) Co., Ltd.
